sqlMap.select: SELECT des_gruppo1 FROM v_kinkropwb WHERE cod_termid = #termId# AND cod_dwreport = #appId# AND qta_riga = #id#

SELECT i.tabella, campo, tabella_pk, campo_pk FROM v_kstd_indici i, v_kstd_campi_indici ci WHERE i.tabella = #tabella# AND i.esterno = -1 AND i.tipo_relazione = 4352 AND i.indice = ci.indice ORDER BY tabella_pk
SELECT DISTINCT cod_dwreport FROM v_kinkropwb WHERE cod_dwreport LIKE #prefissoVariabile# $escapePrefissoVariabile$

#listaAttributiUtente[]#
